thread.title: Four TTP commanders killed in FR Tank raid
thread.title_full: Four TTP commanders killed in FR Tank raid

author: Our Correspondent / News Desk
title: Four TTP commanders killed in FR Tank raid
text:
Share Tweet Email 
TANK: Security forces have killed four Tehreek-e-Taliban Pakistan (TTP) commanders in an intelligence-based operation (IBO) in Frontier Region Tank, a tribal area bordering Tank district of Khyber-Pakhtunkhwa (K-P). 
According to the Inter-Services Public Relations (ISPR), army troops conducted an IBO in Ping area of FR Tank against Asmatullah Shaheen group of the TTP. 
“Four wanted high profile terrorists: Commander Zaman alias Toofan, Umar, commander Wasiullah and commander Zulamdin alias Zulmat were killed,” the statement said on Monday. “Weapons and ammunition also recovered.” PHOTO: ISPR 
Heavy artillery moved towards Pak-Afghan border 
The group was involved in target killings, extortion and kidnapping for ransom in DI Khan, Tank and surrounding areas, the ISPR added. 
Shaheen was an important member of TTP Shura, and was killed by another TTP faction due to internal rift in 2014. 
Pakistan Army has stepped up action against militants in the tribal belt following a spree of attacks that claimed over 100 lives across the country last week.
